title: Group Discussion - Why is TDD considered to be such good practice

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this discussion is to get the entire cohort to engage with one another to explore what they learned about Test-Driven Development from the video and from an actual experience. By holding a group discussion, we can surface and explore more and varied ideas.
